channel.title: AcerScape RSPS!
channel.description:
What makes AcerScape different from other Servers?
AcerScape is a server dedicated to 100% Economy, PvM and PvP! We are a new 317 and looking for staff,
- Website: http://www.acerscape.enjin.com/
- Webclient: https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=AcerScape
Features:
- ClanChat - Custom Home! - Duel Arena - Custom Mining - Decent and fun economy. - All special attacks. - 24.7 Uptime - Trading - Webclient - AutoCasting - 100% Private Messaging - Active helpful staff - Regular updates! - Completely Lag Free! - Runescape like Combat - Working Korasi’s Sword - Multi Barrages - Xp Counter - Working weapon specials and effects - Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! - All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars - Yell with custom tags - Daily Events! - Working Pest Control - Staff Of Light Special
http://gyazo.com/be0e7757ebe4ecad22c0da770e27f22f http://gyazo.com/ee86ea76a4236ffe44188b766992c483 http://gyazo.com/91228dde8b505fbfcdfec0b4900f0cdf http://gyazo.com/126e413026f47dc3600bbd57edc0e3cc http://gyazo.com/5ad9c47b55409f160275102f86eaa632
come and join now!

item.title: AcerScape RSPS!
item.dc:creator: @AcerscapeRSPS AcerscapeRSPS
item.description:
@AcerscapeRSPS wrote:

What makes AcerScape different from other Servers?

AcerScape is a server dedicated to 100% Economy, PvM and PvP! We are a new 317 and looking for staff,

  • Website:
    http://www.acerscape.enjin.com/

  • Webclient:
    https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=AcerScape

Features:

  • ClanChat
  • Custom Home!
  • Duel Arena
  • Custom Mining
  • Decent and fun economy.
  • All special attacks.
  • 24.7 Uptime
  • Trading
  • Webclient
  • AutoCasting
  • 100% Private Messaging
  • Active helpful staff
  • Regular updates!
  • Completely Lag Free!
  • Runescape like Combat
  • Working Korasi’s Sword
  • Multi Barrages
  • Xp Counter
  • Working weapon specials and effects
  • Working curses prayer book, including turmoil!
  • All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars
  • Yell with custom tags
  • Daily Events!
  • Working Pest Control
  • Staff Of Light Special
